Name: Tango Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Beautifully balanced gin-laced herbal complexity with zesty orange.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . Harry MacElhone's 1929 ABC of Cocktails credits this drinks creation to Harry, a bartender at Palermo, Rue Fontaine, Paris.
Nutrition: One serving of Tango Cocktail contains 134 calories
